name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Solutions Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering cloud-based, high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **AWS** and **Azure** deployment, ensuring high availability and resilience through **DevOps** practices and microservices architecture. Expertise in **virtualization** and **container** technologies, and adept at implementing network solutions that enhance application reliability.
Strong skills in building AI-driven applications leveraging **Python**, **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**. Experienced in creating efficient **CI/CD** pipelines and managing both application backup and storage solutions. Committed to compliance-driven development in line with HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, while demonstrating a solid background in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and implemented cloud solutions for high availability and fault tolerance using **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions** to ensure reliable service delivery in healthcare and fintech sectors.
- Applied **DevOps** practices to build and maintain CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps** for seamless integration and deployment across multiple environments.
- Designed distributed systems architecture emphasizing **containerization** technologies such as **Docker** and orchestration tools like **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)** for scalable application deployments.
- Integrated advanced **AI** features by deploying machine learning models for risk scoring and fraud detection through **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**, resulting in improved operational efficiency by **30%**.
- Enhanced application reliability and performance with robust **storage** solutions using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, capable of processing large-scale data with ingestion rates exceeding **10,000 records per minute**.
- Ensured data security and compliance in applications adhering to standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
- Conducted regular system audits and implemented backup strategies to maintain data integrity and availability, achieving **99.9% uptime**.
- Developed virtualization strategies to optimize resource utilization across cloud infrastructure.
- Collaborated with IT teams to ensure seamless network connectivity and application performance.
- Spearheaded initiatives to continuously improve application security through specialized testing strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest**.

Implemented cloud solutions to enhance **high availability** and **backup** strategies for core financial applications, ensuring resilience and disaster recovery.
Leveraged **DevOps** practices to streamline application deployment and improve **container** management, resulting in a 30% reduction in deployment times.
Employed **network** architecture principles to secure data transmissions and optimize API performance across various microservices.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, improving decision-making speed by **60%**.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing of over **5 TB** of data monthly.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, reducing fraud incidents by **25%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.

• Developed high availability solutions utilizing **cloud** technologies and **DevOps** practices, ensuring seamless integration across diverse applications and networks in a global e-commerce environment.
• Implemented robust application architectures, emphasizing **virtualization** and distributed data storage, contributing to **99.9%** uptime and enhanced disaster recovery protocols.
• Engineered **AI** functionalities to drive smart decision-making and personalized customer experiences, using platforms like TensorFlow and scikit-learn.
• Optimized application performance with resilient backup strategies and **storage** solutions, ensuring critical data integrity and quick recovery.
• Designed and maintained network solutions to achieve scalable architecture capable of supporting over **100,000** concurrent users.
• Advanced application monitoring using container strategies and tools like Kubernetes, facilitating rapid deployment cycles and maintaining software quality across versions.
• Collaborated in cross-functional teams to integrate innovative network solutions, aligning application capabilities with modern **cloud** infrastructures.
• Enhanced application security through role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 to guarantee safe operations and customer trust, ensuring compliance with GDPR standards.
• Spearheaded initiatives to benchmark systems under load, achieving an increase in processing efficiency by **40%** while maintaining user satisfaction through improved uptime and response times.
• Strengthened backup framework policies to improve data recovery time objectives (RTO) to under **30 minutes**, minimizing downtime while maximizing system reliability.
